subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Earthquakes
lead_paragraph: For the people of central Italy’s Abruzzo region, the Giro d’Italia — and particularly Italian rider Danilo Di Luca — provide a welcome distraction from the destruction of April’s earthquake.
snippet: For the people of central Italy’s Abruzzo region, the Giro d’Italia — and particularly Italian rider Danilo Di Luca — provide a welcome distraction from the destruction of April’s earthquake.
